sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import myResume from "../../assets/files/Ed_Beard_Resume.pdf"; import { BsCloudDownload } from "react-icons/bs"; import { MdFoundation } from "react-icons/md"; import { GrTechnology } from "react-icons/gr"; import { GrDocumentPerformance } from "react-icons/gr"; function Resume() { return (

My Resume

Please feel free to check out my list of Developer Proficiencies!

{/* // This is the resume language */}

Font-End Tech

  • HTML5
  • CSS
  • JavaScript
  • APIs
  • Bootstrap
  • GIT

Back-End Tech

  • Node.Js
  • Jest
  • Express.js
  • MySQL
  • Sequelize
  • Object-Relational Mapping(ORM)
  • Model-View-Controller (MVC)

Performance Tech

  • NoSQL
  • Progressive Web Applications (PWA)
  • MongoDB
  • Mongoose
  • GraphQL
  • React
  • MERN
  • State

); } export default Resume;
